data.route_analysis: Direct flights available from Moscow to Guatemala City, with layovers in major cities. Recommendations for local transfers include shuttles and taxis. Popular routes include Moscow to New York, then New York to Guatemala City.
data.seasonal_patterns: In October, fewer crowds at tourist hotspots and cultural festivities enrich the travel experience, while November marks the onset of the holiday season with activities appealing to both locals and visitors.
data.climate: In autumn, the climate is generally mild with daytime temperatures around 25°C (77°F) and cooler nights. Recommended clothing includes light layers and rain gear due to occasional showers.
data.culture: Guatemala is rich in cultural traditions with festivals like Dia de los Muertos celebrated at the beginning of November. Visitors should explore local markets and experience traditional cuisine such as Pepian and Kak'ik.
data.attractions: Key attractions include Tikal National Park, Antigua Guatemala, Lake Atitlan, and the Mayan ruins. Activities range from hiking and exploring archaeological sites to enjoying coffee tours.
